successes.title: Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World
successes.description: A Softer World is ending and to celebrate we're doing a collection of our favourite comics, from the very first to the very last.

Pledges.description: A PDF of Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World.
A PDF of Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World, PDFs of all previous A Softer World volumes, AND a Thank You in the Best-of Book.
Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World white hardcover edition, plus a PDF of the book, too!
Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World physical and PDF copies, a print of the first comic and a print of the final comic, plus a thank you in the book! (EARLY BIRD)
Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World physical and PDF copies, a print of the first comic and a print of the final comic, plus a thank you in the book!
Limited Edition RED HARDCOVER edition of Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World, plus a PDF copy of the book, too.
Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World white hardcover edition, plus a PDF of the book and PDFs of all 4 previous A Softer World books, too!
Limited Edition of Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World physical and PDF copies, a print of the first comic and a print of the final comic, plus a thank you in the book!

"I Guess It Really Was A Softer World" Tote, "F**k Politics" Lighter, PLUS The Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World physical and PDF copies, a print of the first comic and a print of the final comic, plus a thank you in the book!

You also get PDFs of all 4 previous A Softer World Books!

You also get physical AND PDF versions of all 4 previous A Softer World books!

Joey Will write you a short letter on your behalf. A job application letter, a resignation letter, a love letter or a letter to your dead best friend. Anything you want! (within the limits of the law, of course) Tell him what you want to convey and he'll make it awesome or sad or insane or ALL THREE.

PLUS  "I Guess It Really Was A Softer World" Tote, "F**k Politics" Lighter, PLUS Limited and Regular Editions of The Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World and PDF copies, a print of the First Comic and a Print of the Last comic, and a thank you in the book!

Emily will Photograph you for use in the book. You must make it to Toronto by June 10th. PLUS you get "I Guess It Really Was A Softer World" Tote, "F**k Politics" Lighter, PLUS Limited and Regular Editions of The Anatomy of Melancholy: The Best of A Softer World and PDF copies, a print of the First Comic and a Print of the Last comic, plus a thank you in the book!
